title: Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On Luggage 20" Lightweight Hardside Suitcase With Silent Spinner Wheels; Purple;  21" carry-on hardside underseat luggage; Color: Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, Light Purple; ABS hard shell, steel rod; Capacity: 33L; Size: 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" (L x W x H); Weight: 5.62lb; 360 degree silent double spinner wheels
descriptions:
Meet your new favorite travel companion: the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On, a sleek 21" hardside suitcase designed to slip under most airline seats while packing smart features into a lightweight, durable build.

Why you’ll love it:
- Underseat friendly, overachiever design: At just 21.85" x 8.35" x 14.76" and only 5.62 lb, it’s sized for stress-free boarding and perfect for 1–3 day trips with a roomy 33L capacity.
- Glide-on-ease mobility: 360° silent double spinner wheels deliver smooth, whisper-quiet maneuvering through terminals, aisles, and tight spaces.
- Tough where it counts: An impact- and scratch-resistant ABS hardshell shields your essentials; a steel telescopic rod adds strength without the weight.
- Comfortable control: An adjustable telescoping handle and soft TPR top handle offer a secure, comfortable grip at multiple heights.
- Smart, organized interior: A full-capacity layout with an elasticated compartment and mesh zip pocket keeps outfits crisp and essentials easy to find.
- Travel-secure: TSA-approved lock for hassle-free security checks and peace of mind on the go.
- Style your journey: Available in standout colors—Blue, Black, Orange, Purple, Green, Light Green, and Light Purple.

From quick business trips to spontaneous weekend getaways, the Travelhouse Underseat Hardshell Carry On blends portability, protection, and polish. Pack light, move fast, look sharp—every trip, every time.
